text:
*[Bug 15275] terms.formula(y ~ (x + fn(z = NA)) - fn(z = NA),simplify=TRUE) does not simplify*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=15275>

--- Comment #8 from Mikael Jagan (<mailto:jaganmn@mcmaster.ca|jaganmn@mcmaster.ca>) ---
Pinging since I think that a fix here could go alongside the changes supporting
non-syntactic specials (bug 18568), already committed to R-devel.  Comment 5
here gives a diagnosis and candidate patch, just waiting for review.
